Html:
Version 2.1 for mac

Using ti-84 Rom

Issue:

I can't seem to do a save state of the calculator. I use the file pull down menu or keyboard keys (cmd - s) to do a save.. no prompt is given to ask where to save it just closes the menu. I then shut the program down and restart it but can only find the ti-84 rom file to load.. and it comes up Ram cleared.
